definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: He is a great teacher whose wise sayings have influenced many people in different countries.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位偉大的先師，他的至理名言影響各國許多人。

sentences.english: You never know out of the mouths of babes and sucklings , remember.
sentences.chinese: 誰知道，不過別忘了，黃口孺子往往能說出至理名言。

sentences.english: You must bear in mind all these wise sayings.
sentences.chinese: 這些至理名言你可要謹記在心。

sentences.english: There is a famous proverb"Life lies in movement".
sentences.chinese: “生命在於運動”，這是一名句至理名言。

sentences.english: Danyang Zhao but perhaps he can be tailored to Balao wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 但趙丹陽或許可以得到巴老爲他量身定做的至理名言。

sentences.english: "painting as the person" is the maxim.
"Masses interest does not have bagatelle " the philosophic theory sex that this one axiom has strong shock force and profundity.
sentences.chinese: 這一至理名言具有強烈的震撼力和深刻的哲理性。

sentences.english: He usually uses some famous dictums in his articles.
sentences.chinese: 他寫作文時經常會用上一些至理名言。

definition: as they say, .../as the saying goes, ...
one cannot achieve glory and wealth without having been through trials and tribulations (proverb)/no pain, no gain
